pl.polidea.treeview

Interface TreeStateManager<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the identifier for nodes in the tree
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryTreeStateManager

    public interface TreeStateManager<T>
extends Serializable
    Manages information about state of the tree. It only keeps information about tree elements, not the elements themselves.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getHierarchyDescription

        Integer[] getHierarchyDescription(T id)
        Returns array of integers showing the location of the node in hierarchy. It corresponds to heading numbering. {0,0,0} in 3 level node is the first node {0,0,1} is second leaf (assuming that there are two leaves in first subnode of the first node).
        Parameters:
        id - id of the node
        Returns:
        textual description of the hierarchy in tree for the node.

      • getLevel

        int getLevel(T id)
        Returns level of the node.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the node
        Returns:
        level in the tree

      • getNodeInfo

        TreeNodeInfo<T> getNodeInfo(T id)
        Returns information about the node.
        Parameters:
        id - node id
        Returns:
        node info

      • getChildren

        List<T> getChildren(T id)
        Returns children of the node.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the node or null if asking for top nodes
        Returns:
        children of the node

      • getParent

        T getParent(T id)
        Returns parent of the node.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the node
        Returns:
        parent id or null if no parent

      • addBeforeChild

        void addBeforeChild(T parent,
                  T newChild,
                  T beforeChild)
        Adds the node before child or at the beginning.
        Parameters:
        parent - id of the parent node. If null - adds at the top level
        newChild - new child to add if null - adds at the beginning.
        beforeChild - child before which to add the new child

      • addAfterChild

        void addAfterChild(T parent,
                 T newChild,
                 T afterChild)
        Adds the node after child or at the end.
        Parameters:
        parent - id of the parent node. If null - adds at the top level.
        newChild - new child to add. If null - adds at the end.
        afterChild - child after which to add the new child

      • removeNodeRecursively

        void removeNodeRecursively(T id)
        Removes the node and all children from the tree.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the node to remove or null if all nodes are to be removed.

      • expandDirectChildren

        void expandDirectChildren(T id)
        Expands all children of the node.
        Parameters:
        id - node which children should be expanded. cannot be null (top nodes are always expanded!).

      • expandEverythingBelow

        void expandEverythingBelow(T id)
        Expands everything below the node specified. Might be null - then expands all.
        Parameters:
        id - node which children should be expanded or null if all nodes are to be expanded.

      • collapseChildren

        void collapseChildren(T id)
        Collapse children.
        Parameters:
        id - id collapses everything below node specified. If null, collapses everything but top-level nodes.

      • getNextSibling

        T getNextSibling(T id)
        Returns next sibling of the node (or null if no further sibling).
        Parameters:
        id - node id
        Returns:
        the sibling (or null if no next)

      • getPreviousSibling

        T getPreviousSibling(T id)
        Returns previous sibling of the node (or null if no previous sibling).
        Parameters:
        id - node id
        Returns:
        the sibling (or null if no previous)

      • isInTree

        boolean isInTree(T id)
        Checks if given node is already in tree.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the node
        Returns:
        true if node is already in tree.

      • getVisibleCount

        int getVisibleCount()
        Count visible elements.
        Returns:
        number of currently visible elements.

      • getVisibleList

        List<T> getVisibleList()
        Returns visible node list.
        Returns:
        return the list of all visible nodes in the right sequence

      • registerDataSetObserver

        void registerDataSetObserver(android.database.DataSetObserver observer)
        Registers observers with the manager.
        Parameters:
        observer - observer

      • unregisterDataSetObserver

        void unregisterDataSetObserver(android.database.DataSetObserver observer)
        Unregisters observers with the manager.
        Parameters:
        observer - observer

      • clear

        void clear()
        Cleans tree stored in manager. After this operation the tree is empty.

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Refreshes views connected to the manager.
